CREATE TABLE lokasi (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nama_lokasi VARCHAR(255),
    jenis VARCHAR(255),
    geom GEOMETRY NOT NULL,
    SPATIAL INDEX(geom)
);


## INSERT DATA
-- Feature 1: Taman Al Manar
INSERT INTO lokasi (id, nama_lokasi, jenis, geom) VALUES
(0, 'Taman Al Manar', 'taman', ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((114.77349452920186 -3.8004862686992027, 114.77329679636648 -3.800733701778995, 114.77431571995498 -3.800909169821736, 114.77349452920186 -3.8004862686992027))'));
